items.title: Chipsynth SFC issues
items.body:
I'm having difficulties with getting [Chipsynth SFC](https://www.plogue.com/products/chipsynth-sfc.html) to work with airwave.

My current wine version is `wine-5.16 (Staging)`. 

It's probably also worth noting that it works properly when launching the stand alone version with wine. I'm also using the trial version (to check if I can / should buy it) which could be affecting airwave usability. 

It seems that the logs indicate that the program could not be initialized.

```
1601250722.657273046     chipsynth SFC.so : Initializing plugin endpoint 1.3.3
1601250722.657280864     chipsynth SFC.so : Plugin binary: /home/eoin/.winvst/chipsynth SFC.so
1601250722.657288610     chipsynth SFC.so : WINE prefix:   /home/eoin/.wine
1601250722.657297120     chipsynth SFC.so : WINE loader:   /usr/bin/wine
1601250722.657303262     chipsynth SFC.so : VST binary:    /home/eoin/.wine/drive_c/Program Files/Plogue/chipsynth SFC/VST/chipsynth SFC.dll
1601250722.659541096     chipsynth SFC.so : Host binary:   /usr/bin/airwave-host-64.exe
1601250722.659547019     chipsynth SFC.so : Log level:     trace
1601250722.659890963     chipsynth SFC.so : Callback thread started
1601250722.659902239     chipsynth SFC.so : Waiting response from host endpoint...
1601250722.721212624    chipsynth SFC.dll : Initializing host endpoint 1.3.3
1601250722.939772377    chipsynth SFC.dll : Waiting for plugin endpoint request...
1601250722.939783894    chipsynth SFC.dll : Request from plugin endpoint received, sending response
1601250722.939791060    chipsynth SFC.dll : Initializing VST plugin...
1601250722.939792885    chipsynth SFC.dll : Unable to initialize VST plugin
1601250722.941378717    chipsynth SFC.dll : Unable to initialize host endpoint
```

Bitwig 3.0.3 ends up being in an endless scanning loop.

Other, simpler plugins seem to work with my current airwave setup.
